WorkingDetails: - Sunday to Thursday (5 days a week)
KeyResponsibilities: - Develop responsive and visually appealing web applications using front-end technologies.
- Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to implement user interfaces and integrate with server-side logic.
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize application performance.
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.
- Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
Requirements: - Proven experience as a Frontend Developer or similar role.
- Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern front-end frameworks (React, Angular, Vue.js).
- Experience with version control systems (Git).
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web services.
- Understanding of responsive design and web accessibility standards.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
TechnicalProficiency: - Knowledge of state management libraries (Redux, MobX).
- Familiarity with build tools and task runners (Webpack, Gulp).

WorkingDetails: Sunday to Thursday (5 days a week)
KeyResponsibilities: Develop and maintain server-side applications and APIs.
Design and implement database schemas and manage data storage solutions.
Ensure application security and data protection.
Write efficient, reusable, and scalable code.
Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Requirements: Proven experience as a Backend Developer or similar role.
Strong knowledge of server-side languages (Node.js, Python, Java, Ruby).
Experience with database management systems (SQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL).
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and web services.
Understanding of server architecture and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure).
TechnicalProficiency: Experience with containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment processes.

WorkingDetails: Sunday to Thursday (5 days a week)
KeyResponsibilities: Design and develop user interfaces for web applications, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.
Work closely with UX designers to implement design concepts and prototypes.
Optimize UI components for performance and responsiveness.
Conduct usability testing and gather feedback for continuous improvement.
Stay updated with the latest UI/UX trends and best practices.
Requirements: Proven experience as a UI Developer or similar role.
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and UI frameworks (Bootstrap, Material-UI).
Experience with design tools (Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch).
Familiarity with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Excellent attention to detail and visual design skills.
TechnicalProficiency: Knowledge of animation libraries and interactive elements (GSAP, Lottie).
Understanding of accessibility standards and guidelines.

WorkingDetails: Sunday to Thursday (5 days a week)
KeyResponsibilities: Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes.
Manage and monitor cloud infrastructure and on-premise servers.
Implement and enforce security best practices and policies.
Collaborate with development teams to optimize application performance and scalability.
Troubleshoot and resolve infrastructure and deployment issues.
Requirements: Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer or similar role.
Strong knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
Experience with containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
Familiarity with configuration management tools (Ansible, Terraform).
Understanding of networking, security, and system administration.
TechnicalProficiency: Experience with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack).
Familiarity with infrastructure as code (IaC) practices.
